title: Stemru
author: Stemru
created_time: September 16, 2023, 07:57:46 AMLast edit: September 16, 2023, 08:30:34 AM by Stemru
content: STEM is a unique startup that creates a completely new asset class and changes the rules of the game in the fan token and betting market. The project is an exchange of sports team statistics tokens, where the price of tokens is formed based on the results of games, ratings and the cost of team players. It offers all sports fans a unique user experience. Based on the analysis of future events or matches of a football club, users can make a decision at auctions and earn money by monetizing their knowledge about sports.The project has passed the development and testing stages and is now ready for an active stage of expansion in the market.To do this, the team sells 25% of the ownership of the project through the STEM DAO.You can get detailed information about the DAO and about the project itself on the websites:https://stemx.prohttps://dao.stemx.pro
